utils.api_utils.create_api_response(status_code, data=None, error_code=None, error_message=None, request_id=None, **kwargs)[æºä»£ç ]ïƒ

Create standardized API response

å‚æ•°:

  • status_code (int) -- HTTP status code

  • data (Optional[Any]) -- Response data (for success responses)

  • error_code (Optional[str]) -- Error code (for error responses)

  • error_message (Optional[str]) -- Error message (for error responses)

  • request_id (Optional[str]) -- Request ID for tracking

  • **kwargs -- Additional response fields
